thread.title: Ray Lewis gives awkward pregame speech for Patriots and Falcons in empty garage
thread.title_full: Ray Lewis gives awkward pregame speech for Patriots and Falcons in empty garage

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Ray Lewis gives awkward pregame speech for Patriots and Falcons in empty garage
text:
February 5, 2017 5:22pm EST February 5, 2017 5:18pm EST Ray Lewis gave a pregame speech to the Patriots and the Falcons in an empty garage â and we're not sure why. ESPN's Ray Lewis (Getty) 
Updated at 5:22 p.m. ET 
Updated at 5:22 p.m. ET 
Ray Lewis gave a pregame speech to the Patriots and the FalconsÂ in an empty garage â and we're not sure why. 
Things got really awkward when he told the empty room to "look around this locker room and look in these man's eyes." So. Many. Chills. @RayLewis unleashes epic pregame speech for the @Patriots . #SB51 https://t.co/hgWwpmXTSj 
MORE:Â Matt Ryan wins MVP the night before Super Bowl 51 
The former NFL star also recorded a pregame speech for the Falcons. "Falcons, Rise Up! Atlanta, Rise Up!" @RayLewis ' pregame speech to the @AtlantaFalcons . đĽđĽđĽ #SB51 https://t.co/R0st1q2Ury â NFL (@NFL) February 5, 2017 
If only he could have delivered the amazing speeches to the actual players and not his garage door. 
We have a feeling that garage door is going to open and close with the greatness of 10,000 garage doors on Sunday. Watch This
